message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,400,000. Let me know if you're interested!

Alice, thanks for the offer! I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, $1,400,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm happy to pay $1,300,000 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to that.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,350,000. Let me know if that works for you!
